text: Indonesia has three time zones: Western Indonesia Time (WIB) (UTC+07:00) covers the western part of the country, including Jakarta, Central Indonesia Time (WITA) (UTC+08:00) covers the central part of the country, and Eastern Indonesia Time (WIT) (UTC+09:00) covers the province of Papua. Indonesia does not observe daylight saving time. == References == Indonesia Category:Indonesia
title: Time in Indonesia
